sentences.sContent: My dream, like that of my mother and her mother, was to fall in love, get married and live happily ever after.
sentences.sCn: 我的梦想，像我妈妈和她妈妈一样，曾经是坠入爱河、结婚、然后从此过上幸福快乐的日子。

sentences.sContent: It is a mystery why we fall in love. It is a mystery how it happens. It is a mystery why some love grows and it is a mystery why some love fails.
sentences.sCn: 我们缘何坠入爱河,这是一个难解的迷.它是怎么发生的,它何时会来到,为何爱会成长,而有些爱又为何会失败,一切都是迷.
